urls.description: Single URL or list of URLs to extract content from (max 20 URLs)
urls.title: Urls

extract_depth.description: Extraction depth - 'basic' for standard content, 'advanced' for tables and embedded content
extract_depth.title: Extract Depth

format.description: Output format - 'markdown' for formatted content, 'text' for plain text
format.title: Format

include_images.description: Include list of images extracted from the URLs
include_images.title: Include Images

include_favicon.description: Include favicon URL for each result
include_favicon.title: Include Favicon

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds (1-60). Default: 10s for basic, 30s for advanced
timeout.title: Timeout
